xx.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all of The Butler Did It challenges:
  • Tea is Served
  • The Masters Belongings
  • Serve the Artillery
  • Pipe and Slappers
  • Pressed and Ironed
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_POISON_DESC: • Eliminate someone with Poison while disguised as a Butler.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_DAGGER_DESC: • Acquire the Burial Dagger while disguised as a Butler.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_CANNONBALL_DESC: • Pacify 5 people with a Cannonball while disguised as a Butler.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_LEADPIPE_DESC: • Pacify 10 people with a Lead Pipe while disguised as a Butler.
xx.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_IRONMAIDEN_DESC: • While disguised as a Butler, eliminate someone with the Iron Maiden.

en.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Complete all of The Butler Did It challenges:
  • Tea is Served
  • The Master's Belongings
  • Serve the Artillery
  • Pipe and Slappers
  • Pressed and Ironed
en.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_POISON_DESC: • Eliminate someone with poison while disguised as a Butler.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_DAGGER_DESC: • Acquire the burial dagger while disguised as a Butler.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_CANNONBALL_DESC: • Pacify 5 people with a cannonball while disguised as a Butler.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_LEADPIPE_DESC: • Pacify 10 people with a lead pipe while disguised as a Butler.
en.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_IRONMAIDEN_DESC: • Eliminate someone with the iron maiden while disguised as a Butler.

fr.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Terminez tous les défis C'est le majordome ! :
  • Le thé est servi
  • Les affaires du maître
  • L'artillerie est servie
  • Du plomb dans la tête
  • Pressing pas cher
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_POISON_DESC: • Éliminez quelqu'un avec du poison déguisé en majordome.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_DAGGER_DESC: • Obtenez la dague de cérémonie déguisé en majordome.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_CANNONBALL_DESC: • Neutralisez 5 personnes avec un boulet de canon déguisé en majordome.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_LEADPIPE_DESC: • Neutralisez 10 personnes avec un tuyau déguisé en majordome.
fr.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_IRONMAIDEN_DESC: • Éliminez quelqu'un avec la vierge de fer déguisé en majordome.

it.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Completa tutte le sfide "È stato il maggiordomo":
  • Il tè è servito
  • Gli averi del padrone
  • Servi l'artiglieria
  • Non si vede un tubo
  • Stirato e ben schiacciato
it.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_POISON_DESC: • Elimina qualcuno con il veleno usando il travestimento da maggiordomo.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_DAGGER_DESC: • Impossessati del pugnale per la sepoltura usando il travestimento da maggiordomo.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_CANNONBALL_DESC: • Neutralizza 5 persone con una palla di cannone usando il travestimento da maggiordomo.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_LEADPIPE_DESC: • Neutralizza 10 persone con un tubo di piombo usando il travestimento da maggiordomo.
it.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_IRONMAIDEN_DESC: • Elimina qualcuno con la vergine di Norimberga usando il travestimento da maggiordomo.

de.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Schließen Sie alle „Der Butler war's“-Herausforderungen ab:
  • Teezeit
  • Scharf geschliffen
  • Kanonendienst
  • Fallrohr
  • Bügelpresse
de.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_POISON_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie als Butler verkleidet jemanden mit Gift.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_DAGGER_DESC: • Beschaffen Sie als Butler verkleidet den Begräbnisdolch.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_CANNONBALL_DESC: • Stellen Sie als Butler verkleidet 5 Personen mit einer Kanonenkugel ruhig.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_LEADPIPE_DESC: • Stellen Sie als Butler verkleidet 10 Personen mit einem Bleirohr ruhig.
de.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_IRONMAIDEN_DESC: • Eliminieren Sie als Butler verkleidet jemanden mit der Eisernen Jungfrau.

es.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_WRAPPER_DESC:
Completa los desafíos de Ha sido el mayordomo:
  • El té está servido
  • Las pertenencias del amo
  • Artillería servida
  • Tubería de tortazos
  • Planchado profesional
es.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_POISON_DESC: • Elimina a alguien con veneno disfrazado de mayordomo.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_DAGGER_DESC: • Consigue la daga funeraria disfrazado de mayordomo.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_CANNONBALL_DESC: • Deja inconscientes a 5 personas con una bala de cañón disfrazado de mayordomo.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_LEADPIPE_DESC: • Deja inconscientes a 10 personas con una tubería de plomo disfrazado de mayordomo.
es.CHALLENGEPACK_BERYLIUM_IRONMAIDEN_DESC: • Mientras estés disfrazado de mayordomo, elimina a alguien con la doncella de hierro.
